text: Nitwajombwesye mbwani ŵanache ŵa Israila, basi Firiauna ni asilikali ŵakwe ŵakuyiye ŵanganyao mwa uwwanga ni umagongo, kwikanila ndema jakunsimene (Firiauna) kumilwa jwatite: “Ngulupilile yanti: Pangali jwakuŵajilwa kun’galagatila ikaŵeje Ajula jwankulupilile ŵanache ŵa Israila, soni une ndili mwa Asilamu.”
